name: Green Cat Chronicle
description:
Controls
Space,[Z],A-Button : Jump

Your object is to continue defeating the enemies with bubbles. Various items will help you.
As the game progresses for a while, the background and music will change. Let's see how far you can proceed!

Items
Apple : 50 pts.
Cabbage : Flash
Fish : Recovery
Balloon : Four bubbles
Computer : Invincible

If would like to support my works, please consider backing me on patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/pigmhall
